ISSUE.TITLE: Error route doesn't exist in CommonController
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It seems like RouteProvider is registering a controller route that doesn't exist. Is this intentional? Am I missing something? There is no `Error` method on the `CommonController` or any of its parent classes. https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/71bfc4bd54d9218b5e148546c356e3b15b7bb2bb/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Infrastructure/RouteProvider.cs#L689-L692

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixed problem with executing sync version of setting.Load method

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6479 Removed unused and not exists route We forgot to delete it in the ed1321d282a42b786747e6528bfb1368854275b9 commit
